title: Disney makes a risky call
description:
Disney thinks that audiences will actually be returning to the movies in theaters next spring. The company announced plans to release Black Widow, the latest Marvel movie, in early May. Recode’s Peter Kafka explains why Disney is making this call and how their streaming business matches up with Netflix
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
